summary:
Replaces normal colored dragon scale with stylish black dragon scale. (Have no made a female version yet, although will once i get around to it.)

Reason for this is I decided the normal dragon scale looked like Tree bark armor, not dragon scales. So I figured since most of the dragon you fought were black, then black armor would be the best choi
descriptionHtml:
Replaces normal colored dragon scale with stylish black dragon scale. (Have no made a female version yet, although will once i get around to it.)

Reason for this is I decided the normal dragon scale looked like Tree bark armor, not dragon scales. So I figured since most of the dragon you fought were black, then black armor would be the best choice of armor.
author: DigitalStef
